alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wayne, Cayuga, southwestern Oswego and northeastern Ontario Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newark, or 11 miles northwest of Geneva, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oswego, Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Newark, Williamson, Lyons, Clyde, Phelps, Sodus, Cato, Chimney Bluffs State Park, Nine Mile Point, Battle Island State Park, Scriba, Volney, Palermo, Sterling, Phoenix, Rose and Ira. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
